casebody.data:
Leo C. SAFIR and the Rabhor Co., Appellees, v. ROYAL ROBES, Inc., Appellant. No. 179. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 3, 1930. Asher Blum, of New York City (Hugo Mock, of New York City, on the brief), for appellant. W. B. Morton, of New York City (R. B. Canfield, of New York City, on the brief), for appellees.

. Before L. " HAND, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
